name: prmetrics
description: Augments pull request titles to let reviewers quickly determine PR size and test coverage.

scripts.build:debug: npm run build:initialization --dir=debug && cd build/debug/task && npm install && tsc --sourceMap
scripts.build:release: npm run build:initialization --dir=release && cd build/release/task && npm install && ncc build index.ts --out . --minify && rimraf node_modules src tests typedocs *.ts .mocharc.json .nycrc.json package-lock.json package.json tsconfig.json typedoc.json
scripts.build:package: npm install && ncc build src/task/index.ts --out dist --minify && rimraf dist/package.json && ncp src/task/Strings/resources.resjson/en-US/resources.resjson dist/resources.resjson
scripts.build: npm run build:release && npm run build:package && npm run build:docs
scripts.deploy: npm run build:release && exitzero tfx build tasks delete --task-id 907d3b28-6b37-4ac7-ac75-9631ee53e512 --no-prompt && tfx build tasks upload --task-path build/release/task --no-prompt
scripts.test: npm run build:debug && cd build/debug/task && nyc --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary mocha tests/**/*.spec.js --check-leaks --color
